name: SKULLDUGGERY
description:
Avast ye! There be a new game on the horizon!

SKULLDUGGERY is an upcoming pirate-themed couch co-op fighting game full of beards, blunderbusses, and other swashbuckling shenanigans! Battle your friends and feed them to the fishes as your fight for rum, plunder, and glory (but mainly rum). 

Early Test Demo: Out Now! Download our pre-release build and help us test the game! Those bugs won't fix themselves.

Key Features:

  • Explore the seven seas – Battle it out over a variety of stages and settings as you prove to those scallywags who’s boss in our 'Elimination' game mode.
  • No time for parlé? Solve things like a true pirate! - Explore a variety of items so that you can find the most diplomatic (or explosive) solution to all your pirate related problems.
  • Ultra-realistic beard simulation - We’ve spent countless hours refining our beard graphics to provide the most immersive pirate experience.

 Upcoming Features:

  • Wider variety of weapons and items.
  • More levels and environments.
  • ‘King of the Booty’ and ‘Plunder’ game modes.
  • Rum….and plenty of it!

Follow us for more updates and news! :D

Devlog currently at: https://gamejolt.com/games/skullduggery/589325
